task.title: Assign Geofence Enforcement to Employees
task.shortdesc: After geofences and geofence groups have been created, administrators need to assign geofence enforcement to employees.

step.cmd: Select the Add Geofence Enforcement link.

image.alt: Assign Geofence Enforcement to an Employee

step.cmd: Enter the start and end dates that geofencing should be applied to this employee, if applicable.
Select the type of geofence enforcement (Active, Passive, or None). The default is None, which means geofencing does not apply to the employee.
